extendedIngredients.name: broccoli
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 medium bunch broccoli, cut into florets

extendedIngredients.name: fresh basil
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tablespoon minced fresh basil or 1 teaspoon dried basil

extendedIngredients.name: fresh parsley
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley or 1 teaspoon dried parsley flakes

extendedIngredients.name: turkey sausage
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pound Italian turkey sausage links, cut into 1/4-inch slices

recipes.title: Broccoli Sausage Simmer
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large skillet, saute the sausage, broccoli and onion for 5-6 minutes or until broccoli is crisp-tender. Add the tomatoes, basil, parsley and sugar. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. Add pasta and heat through.                                        Yield: 4 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Broccoli Sausage Simmer in  The Taste of Home Cookbook2010, p42                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving equals 384 calories, 12 g fat (2 g saturated fat), 68 mg cholesterol, 760 mg sodium, 44 g carbohydrate, 8 g fiber, 28 g protein. Diabetic Exchanges: 3 medium-fat meat, 2 starch, 2 vegetable.                                                                                                                                                                    Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large skillet, saute the sausage, broccoli and onion for 5-6 minutes or until broccoli is crisp-tender.
Add the tomatoes, basil, parsley and sugar. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes.
